lp.title: Pixoo – Create and Edit Stunning Images with AI

seo.title: Pixoo - AI Image Generator, Photo Editing, Digital Art & More

commercialLicense.title: Commercial License
commercialLicense.description: Use your creations in commercial projects without restrictions

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You’ll keep access to features until the end of the paid period.

credits.question: Do unused credits expire?
credits.answer: Credits renew monthly. Unused credits do not roll over to the next month.

commercial.question: Can I use generated images commercially?
commercial.answer: Yes, all paid plans include a commercial license. You can use images for personal and commercial projects.

free.question: How does the free plan work?
free.answer: The free plan offers 5 daily credits that renew automatically. Perfect for trying out our platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers about our AI image generation platform

whatIsPixoo.question: What is Pixoo?
whatIsPixoo.answer: Pixoo is an artificial intelligence platform that lets you create stunning images from text descriptions. Our advanced AI turns your ideas into high-quality visual art.

howItWorks.question: How does image generation work?
howItWorks.answer: Simply describe what you want to see in text and our AI creates a unique image based on your description. You can adjust styles, dimensions, and other parameters to get the perfect result.

commercialUse.question: Can I use the images commercially?
commercialUse.answer: Yes! With our paid plans, you have full commercial rights to the generated images. Use them in personal or commercial projects, marketing, and more.

imageQuality.question: What is the quality of the generated images?
imageQuality.answer: Our images are generated in high resolution with professional quality. We offer different sizes and styles to meet your specific needs.

technicalKnowledge.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
technicalKnowledge.answer: No! Pixoo is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. Anyone can create amazing images, regardless of technical experience.

editExisting.question: Can I edit existing images?
editExisting.answer: Yes! In addition to creating new images, you can upload existing images and use our AI to edit them, remove backgrounds, change styles, and more.

ctaBanner.title: Create or Edit Your Image with AI Now
ctaBanner.description: Join thousands of users already creating and transforming images with artificial intelligence. Start free and discover Pixoo’s creative power.
